collection.body_html: High-quality smart alarm clocks for better wake up for enhanced sleep comfort. Browse our expert-selected range of products designed for optimal rest and relaxation.

products.title: Atomzx Mini Bluetooth White Noise Alarm Clock Sleep Aid & LED Speaker for Music & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Atomzx Mini Bluetooth White Noise Alarm Clock Sleep Aid & LED Speaker for Music & Relaxation

Relax, sleep better, and wake up refreshed with the Atomzx Mini Bluetooth White Noise Alarm Clock. This multifunctional bedside companion combines wireless music playback, soothing white noise, and a modern LED clock. Compact, portable, and rechargeable, it’s perfect for bedrooms, desks, or home offices.

Key Features:

  • Bluetooth speaker for wireless music and calls

  • White noise & nature sounds to improve relaxation and sleep quality

  • LED digital clock with alarm function for easy time tracking

  • Compact and stylish design to fit any bedside or desktop setup

  • Multifunctional: speaker, alarm clock, and sleep aid

  • USB rechargeable – convenient for home or travel use

Specifications:

  • Type: Mini Bluetooth White Noise Alarm Clock

  • Brand: Atomzx

  • Functions: Alarm clock, Bluetooth speaker, white noise machine

  • Power: USB rechargeable

  • Size: Compact and portable

  • Use Case: Home, office, bedroom, travel

Why You'll Love It:

  • Multifunctional device for sleep, relaxation, and music

  • Portable and rechargeable for easy placement anywhere

  • Soothing white noise and nature sounds to enhance rest

  • Modern LED clock display with alarm for convenience

  • Stylish, space-saving design fits any bedroom or office setup

  • Ideal for students, professionals, or frequent travelers

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Atomzx Mini Bluetooth White Noise Alarm Clock

  • 1 x USB Charging Cable

  • 1 x User Manual

products.body_html:
Chronoses White Noise Double Alarm Clock Sleep Aid USB Powered for Bedroom & Living Room

Fall asleep faster and wake up refreshed with the Chronoses White Noise Double Alarm Clock. Combining soothing white noise with dual alarms, this compact clock promotes restful sleep while ensuring you start your day on time.

How to Use:

  1. Plug in via USB or use battery (if applicable).

  2. Set your preferred white noise mode to relax at bedtime.

  3. Program two separate alarms for flexible wake-up times.

  4. Adjust volume for both alarms and sleep sounds to suit your comfort.

Specifications:

  • Power Type: USB Powered

  • Functions: Double alarm, white noise, adjustable volume

  • Display: LED screen

  • Color: White / Black (depending on variant)

  • Material: Plastic

  • Size: Compact for bedside tables or travel

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Dual alarm function for flexible scheduling

  • Soothing white noise to improve sleep quality

  • Adjustable volume and LED display for convenience

  • Compact and stylish design fits any room décor

  • USB powered for energy efficiency and portability

products.title: Clockix Multi-Functional White Noise Alarm Clock Bluetooth Speaker & Ambient Light for Music & Hands-Free Calls
products.body_html:
Clockix Multi-Functional White Noise Alarm Clock Bluetooth Speaker & Ambient Light for Music & Hands-Free Calls

Upgrade your bedside experience with the Clockix Multi-Functional Alarm Clock. This versatile device combines white noise, ambient lighting, and Bluetooth speaker functionality with mobile and headphone charging to enhance your sleep, relaxation, and convenience.

Designed with ABS, PC, silicone, and cloth materials, the sleek black clock is perfect for any room decor. Charge your devices wirelessly or via Type-C input, enjoy soothing white noise, and wake up gently with customizable alarm settings and ambient light features.

Key Features:

  • White noise function to aid sleep and relaxation

  • Bluetooth speaker for music and hands-free calls

  • Ambient light for soothing bedtime illumination

  • Wireless mobile charging: 5W/7.5W/10W/15W (Max)

  • Headphone charging output: 3W/5W (Max)

  • Speaker output: 4Ω 5W with 10m Bluetooth range

  • Type-C input for fast and efficient charging

  • Sleek universal design in black, fits any bedside setup

Specifications:

  • Color: Black

  • Interface Type: Type-C

  • Style: Universal

  • Mobile Charging Output: 5W/7.5W/10W/15W (Max)

  • Headphone Charging Output: 3W/5W (Max)

  • Speaker Output: 4Ω 5W

  • Bluetooth Link Range: 10 m

  • Charging Efficiency: 75%

  • Material: ABS + PC + Silicone + Cloth

  • Input: Type-C 9V/3A; 12V/2.5A

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Multifunctional device: alarm clock, white noise machine, Bluetooth speaker, ambient light, and charger

  • Soothes sleep and enhances relaxation with ambient light and white noise

  • Convenient wireless charging for phones and headphones

  • Compact and stylish design, perfect for bedside or office

  • Ideal for home, travel, or gifting

products.title: Equinoxn Alarm Clock White Noise USB Charging Touch Night Lamp for Home & Bedroom
products.body_html:
Equinoxn Alarm Clock White Noise USB Charging Touch Night Lamp for Home & Bedroom

Combine functionality and relaxation with the Equinoxn Alarm Clock White Noise. This compact alarm clock features soothing white noise, touch controls, and a small night lamp to create a calming environment for sleep or work. Perfect for bedrooms, offices, or travel, it helps you wake up refreshed while maintaining a relaxing atmosphere.

How to Use:

  1. Connect the alarm clock to a 5V2A USB power source.

  2. Use touch controls to set the alarm and adjust white noise volume.

  3. Choose night lamp brightness or color for a soft lighting effect.

  4. Place on a bedside table for convenient access and optimal performance.

Specifications:

  • Size: 225 x 51 x 228 mm

  • Standards: American Standard, European Standard

  • Style: Creative

  • Power: 5V2A USB Charging

  • Functions: Alarm, White Noise, Night Lamp, Touch Control

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Combines alarm clock, white noise, and night lamp in one compact device

  • USB charging makes it convenient and energy-efficient

  • Touch-control operation is simple and intuitive

  • Helps improve sleep quality and creates a relaxing atmosphere

  • Sleek, creative design fits any bedroom or workspace

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Equinoxn Alarm Clock White Noise Night Lamp

products.body_html:
Litchie Cartoon Alarm Clock White Noise Phone Holder & Night Light for Bedroom & Living Room

Make bedtime and mornings fun and stress-free with the Litchie Cartoon Alarm Clock. This adorable cartoon-style clock not only tells time but also features white noise for sleep, a mobile phone holder, and multifunctional night light capabilities.

Designed with soft silicone material, it is safe, durable, and child-friendly. The compact and lightweight design makes it perfect for bedrooms, offices, or bedside tables, while its quiet white noise function helps create a calming environment for sleep or relaxation.

  • White Noise Sleep Aid: Helps block distractions for restful sleep.

  • Mobile Phone Holder: Conveniently prop up your phone for easy access.

  • Multifunctional Night Light: Soft illumination suitable for children and adults.

  • Cartoon Design: Fun and charming aesthetic for any room.

  • Safe & Durable: Made from high-quality silicone, soft to touch.

  • Material: Silicone

  • Style: Cartoon

  • Functions: Alarm clock, white noise, night light, phone holder

Nexusot White Noise RGB Dual Alarm Clock For Wake-up & Sleep-Friendly Environment

Start your day calmly and enjoy restful nights with the Nexusot White Noise Dual Alarm Clock. Featuring dual wake-up alarms and a touch RGB colorful light, this heart-shaped clock combines functionality and modern design to enhance any bedroom or office space.

Perfect as a gift for birthdays, housewarmings, festivals, or corporate events, the Nexusot clock adds convenience and style to your daily routine. The built-in white noise function helps create a soothing sleep environment, while the touch operation allows easy adjustment of alarms and lighting settings.

Key Features:

  • Dual Alarm Function: Set two independent alarms for flexible wake-up times.

  • White Noise: Promotes better sleep and relaxation.

  • Touch RGB Light: Colorful lighting to brighten your mornings or evenings.

products.title: Sparkox Kids’ Alarm Clock with Bluetooth Touch RGB & White Noise for Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Sparkox Kids’ Alarm Clock with Bluetooth Touch RGB & White Noise for Sleep & Relaxation

Create a fun and soothing sleep environment for children with the Sparkox Kids’ Alarm Clock. Combining a Bluetooth speaker, touch RGB lights, and white noise, this multifunctional alarm clock promotes healthy sleep habits while doubling as an interactive bedside companion.

How to Use:

  1. Connect the alarm clock via Bluetooth to play music, stories, or audio.

  2. Adjust the touch RGB lights to your child’s preferred colors and brightness.

  3. Activate the white noise function to help children sleep peacefully.

  4. Set the wake-up light for a gentle and gradual morning alarm.

  5. Place the clock on a bedside table for easy access and daily use.

Specifications:

  • Material: ABS Plastic & Electronic Components

  • Type: Kids’ Alarm Clock with Bluetooth & RGB Lights

  • Power: Rechargeable / Adapter (check product variant)

  • Features: Bluetooth speaker, touch RGB lights, white noise, wake-up light, kid-friendly design

  • Usage: Bedroom, nursery, or as a birthday gift

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Combines music, colorful lights, and white noise for a fun sleep routine

  • Promotes healthy sleep habits and peaceful rest for children

  • Kid-friendly design with easy and safe operation

  • Compact, durable, and ideal for daily use

  • Enhances both bedtime and morning wake-up experiences

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Sparkox Kids’ Alarm Clock with Bluetooth, Touch RGB & White Noise
